DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study compare rate glaucomatous optic neuropathy professional wind versus non-wind instrument player Philadelphia Orchestra . A secondary objective evaluate intra-ocular pressure choroidal thickness wind instrument player variable play condition .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Rates Glaucoma Professional Wind Versus Non-Wind Instrument Players
DOC.detailed_description: Participants study current retired member Philadelphia Orchestra . Approximately 100 participant divide 2 group : 1 ) wind instrument player 2 ) non-wind instrument player . A wind instrument define instrument contains resonator , column air set resonation player blow mouthpiece one end resonator . A non-wind instrument define instrument meet wind instrument criterion . On day eye examination , investigator provide brief overview explain purpose goal study potential participant . The examination team set adjoining room . Members orchestra able visit examination team time practice session . A trained technician perform follow eye participant : visual acuity , undilated fundus color photography intra-ocular pressure measurement . The investigator record examination finding use standard form . Demographic information , include ocular , medical , social , family history , document participant .
DOC.criteria: Play wind nonwind instrument average 1 hour per day minimum 5 year . Normal general health . Incisional eye surgery < 1 month prior visit 1 .
